original_text: His enemies will be angry with him. They will attack him with arrows.
korean_text: 활쏘는 자가 그를 학대하며 적개심을 가지고 그를 쏘았으나

sentences.original_text: His enemies will be angry with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 원수들이 그에게 화를 낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will attack him with arrows
